comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Not 100% sure - I think this may be before 1901 because of the lack of tramway sheds at Fort Macquarie.  On the other hand the ladies' frocks do look very Edwardian.  Hmmm ...

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Agreed re the date - the original catalogue entry says 1891 - although I am not sure where this detail came from.
